channel.title: Help with NRS3server - MySQL
channel.description:
Hey, I've been developing my own rsps using NRS3server V4, but there's an antileech using the MySQL and idk how to remove it. Whenever I startup the server, I get this message and then everything loads:
[code]java.sql.SQLException: null, message from server: "Host '****-lic***-2-0-c***23*.*-2.*ab*e.********.com' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server" at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:1073) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:987) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:982) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1128) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.coreConnect(ConnectionImpl.java:2336) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.connectOneTryOnly(ConnectionImpl.java:2369) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionImpl.java:2153) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.<init>(ConnectionImpl.java:792) at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.<init>(JDBC4Connection.java:47) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:411) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(ConnectionImpl.java:381) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java:305) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at com.rs.content.mysql.HighScoreConnection.createConnection(HighScoreConnection.java:62) at com.rs.content.mysql.HighScoreConnection.<init>(HighScoreConnection.java:54) at com.rs.Launcher.<clinit>(Launcher.java:279) [Launcher] Initing Cache... [GrandExchange] Loading Data... [Launcher] Initing Data Files... [Launcher] Initing Fishing Spots... [Launcher] Initing NPC Combat Scripts... [Launcher] Initing Dialogues... [Launcher] Initing Controlers... [Launcher] Initing Cutscenes... [Launcher] Initing Friend Chats Manager... [Launcher] Initing Cores Manager... [Launcher] Initing World... [Launcher] Initing Region Builder... [Launcher] Initing Server Channel Handler... [Launcher] Server took 3485 milli seconds to launch.[/code]
Any help would be MUCH appreciated!
Skype Name: Haydnz1234

item.title: Help with NRS3server - MySQL
item.dc:creator: @runeslaer25 runeslaer25
item.description:
@runeslaer25 wrote:

Use ecplise kid once you delete the file itll show you what else to delete -.- not telling you where though, because its times source

Read full topic

item.title: Help with NRS3server - MySQL
item.dc:creator: @vuezion vuezion
item.description:
@vuezion wrote:

Just download the fixed one
http://uppit.com/qhd1vfe3ntfa/NRS3server_725_%28_fixed_version_%29.rar

Read full topic
